mapper.select: SELECT A.a_id, A.s_id, A.sigungu_id, A.a_theme_id, A.a_start_date, A.a_end_date, A.a_addr, A.a_name, A.a_one_liner, A.a_min_people, A.a_max_people, A.a_charge, A.a_thumbnail_img, A.s_site, A.a_reservation_deadline, B.a_post_id, B.a_img_id, B.a_post_content, B.a_view_cnt, B.a_favorite_cnt, B.a_post_date_created, C.a_img1, C.a_img2, C.a_img3, C.a_img4, C.a_img5 FROM activity_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_post B ON A.a_id = B.a_id LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_images C ON B.a_img_id = C.a_img_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_info ( a_id, s_id, sigungu_id, a_theme_id, a_start_date, a_end_date, a_addr, a_name, a_one_liner, a_min_people, a_max_people, a_charge, s_site, a_reservation_deadline ) VALUES ( activity_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sId}, #{sigunguId}, #{aThemeId}, TO_DATE(#{aStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{aEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{aAddr}, #{aName}, #{aOneLiner}, #{aMinPeople}, #{aMaxPeople}, #{aCharge}, #{sSite}, TO_DATE(#{aReservationDeadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )

INSERT INTO activity_post ( a_post_id, a_id, a_img_id, a_post_content, a_view_cnt, a_favorite_cnt, a_post_date_created ) VALUES ( activity_post_seq.NEXTVAL, #{aId}, #{aImgId}, #{aPostContent}, #{aViewCnt}, #{aFavoriteCnt}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE activity_info SET a_img_id = #{aImgId} WHERE a_id = #{aId}

UPDATE activity_info SET a_img_id = #{aImgId}, sigungu_id = #{sigunguId}, a_theme_id = #{aThemeId}, a_start_date = to_timestamp(#{aStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), a_end_date = to_timestamp(#{aEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), a_addr = #{aAddr}, a_name = #{aName}, a_one_liner = #{aOneLiner}, a_min_people = #{aMinPeople}, a_max_people = #{aMaxPeople}, a_charge = #{aCharge}, s_site = #{sSite}, a_reservation_deadline = to_timestamp(#{aReservationDeadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE a_id = #{aId}
UPDATE activity_images SET a_img1 = #{aImg1}, a_img2 = #{aImg2}, a_img3 = #{aImg3}, a_img4 = #{aImg4}, a_img5 = #{aImg5} WHERE a_img_id = #{aId}
